text: Thx, for sharing caro @sarito 🙏🏼 honestly I just laugh about this add, cos it’s just another big multi concern wanting to make money with this add 😂 In reality their still as homophobe as the rest of the “right poled” males 😱😪 the fact that heterosexual guys are boycotting @gillette just proves that - Know that white hetero men, the number one power keeper on this planet will wanna keep everything how it always been! Which of those men is even open to give women the same rights, powers & money as they keep on putting in their pockets?? 🤔 You know the scary answer 😪
